title: Inform
text: Let people know about a product (phone) or a service (kids’ salon) that a company promotes.

title: Persuade
text: Show why a company’s product or service is better than others.

title: Remind
text: Keep the product or service of the company in people’s minds so they don’t forget.

title: Build Trust
text: Make people believe in the company’s values through branding.

title: Increase Sales
text: More people buying means the business and the company earn more money.
